statements: SELECT * FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, oxygen_level, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE oxygen_level > 95;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 60;
SELECT patient_id, oxygen_level FROM vital_signs ORDER BY oxygen_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, oxygen_level FROM vital_signs WHERE blood_pressure = 'Normal';
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM vital_signs GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(oxygen_level) AS max_oxygen_level FROM vital_signs GROUP BY patient_id HAVING MAX(oxygen_level) > 95;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, oxygen_level FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%High%';
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature, timestamp FROM VitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure, timestamp FROM VitalSigns ORDER BY blood_pressure DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT patient_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%emergency%';
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM VitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure > 120;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT Alerts.patient_id, Alerts.alert_message, VitalSigns.heart_rate FROM Alerts JOIN VitalSigns ON Alerts.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Data;
SELECT patient_id, body_temperature FROM Patient_Data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure_systolic, blood_pressure_diastolic FROM Patient_Data WHERE blood_pressure_systolic > 120 AND blood_pressure_diastolic < 80;
SELECT patient_id, body_temperature FROM Patient_Data ORDER BY body_temperature DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM Provider_Alerts WHERE read_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure_systolic, blood_pressure_diastolic FROM Patient_Data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, body_temperature FROM Patient_Data WHERE body_temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM Alert_Log ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, read_status FROM Provider_Alerts WHERE read_status = false;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, temperature FROM patients JOIN vitals ON patients.patient_id = vitals.patient_id WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients JOIN vitals ON patients.patient_id = vitals.patient_id WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, alert_msg, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vitals WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120/%80%';
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' AND sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Motion');
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT patient_name, alert_message FROM Alerts JOIN Patient ON Alerts.patient_id = Patient.patient_id ORDER BY alert_datetime DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT alert_message, alert_datetime FROM Alerts WHERE alert_resolved = FALSE ORDER BY alert_datetime DESC;
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, temperature FROM Patient JOIN VitalSigns ON Patient.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 98.6;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%' ORDER BY sensor_location ASC;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Alerts.alert_message, AlertLog.alert_status FROM Patient JOIN Alerts ON Patient.patient_id = Alerts.patient_id JOIN AlertLog ON Alerts.alert_id = AlertLog.alert_id WHERE AlertLog.alert_resolved = TRUE;
